description: Dark green leaves with white snow patches and edge transparency

transparency.note: Variable transparency at edges, solid at center

base_colors.note: Dark green base colors, slightly darker than normal leaves

light_specks.description: Snow patches and particles - large patches and small particles combined

color_adjustment.note: Add white/blue snow coloring over dark green leaves (250-20=230, 250-80=170, 255-15=240)

edge_definition.note: Edges are pixels within 1 pixel of border (edgeX <= 1 || edgeX >= texturePixelSize-2)

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate triple noise: leafNoise = (sin(globalX * 0.9 + globalY * 0.6) * 0.25 + cos(globalX * 0.7 + globalY * 0.9) * 0.25 + sin((globalX + globalY) * 0.8) * 0.5) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step2: Apply base leaf colors: r = 20 + leafNoise * 40, g = 80 + leafNoise * 60, b = 15 + leafNoise * 30
generation_algorithm.step3: Calculate local pixel coordinates for snow patches: pixelX_snowyleaves = globalX % 16, pixelY_snowyleaves = globalY % 16
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply snow patches and particles using light_specks patterns (add white/blue coloring)
generation_algorithm.step5: Calculate edge transparency: edges get alpha = 200 + leafNoise * 55, center gets alpha = 255
generation_algorithm.step6: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded snowy leaves texture algorithm
metadata.pattern_type: Pattern 4 - Triple noise generation with snow patch overlay and edge transparency

conversion_notes.algorithm_complexity: Advanced triple noise with dual overlay systems
unique_features: Triple noise: sin/cos/sin combination with different weights (0.25/0.25/0.5)
Combined snow system: 5 different modulo patterns for large patches and small particles
Variable edge transparency system with noise-based alpha variation
Dark green leaf base with high contrast white/blue snow effects
Unified light_specks system combining original snow patches and new particle patterns
conversion_notes.validation_required: Generated texture must match snowy leaves blocks with proper snow distribution and edge transparency
